data.actual_result: Backtick markdown only shows the formatted text, causing nearly invisible text on light theme
data.expected_result: Backtick markdown shows the full formatting
data.short_description: Backtick markdown doesn't show the background in in-app notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on a status that receives in-app notifications - Have someone send you a DM with backtick markdown - Observe the text in the in-app notification
